adj_mark.description: The text displayed in the column header that shows the mark of the student adjusted to be between 0 and the maximum mark that any student has obtained.

adj_mark_info.message: Se ajusta la nota con respecto a las otras. Es decir, la nota más alta será el 10, y la más baja el 0. Esto no tendrá ningun efecto si la nota máxima ya es un 10 y la mínima un 0
adj_mark_info.description: The explanation of the adjusted mark field.

data_extra.description: The header for the container that shows the data that the extension has calculated.

num_alu.description: The label used in the data table that shows the amount of students that were in the lists for the exam.

num_pres.description: The label used in the data table that shows the amount of students that went to the exam.

per_pres.description: The label used in the data table that shows the amount of students that wen to the exam in comparison to the ones who didn't.

per_aprov.description: The label used in the data table that shows the percentage of students that got a mark greater or equal to 5.

mean_mark.description: The label used in the data table that shows the median of the marks obtained by the students.
